alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 1:28PM MST until August 27 at 2:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 215 PM MST. * At 128 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near White Tank Mountain Park, or 8 miles west of Sun City West, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glendale, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Youngtown, Sun City West, Sun City, Waddell, Wittmann, Litchfield Park, White Tank Mountain Park, Luke AFB and Beardsley. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 124 and 131. US Highway 60 between mile markers 127 and 148. AZ Route 303 between mile markers 105 and 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
